quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Buffy and Series
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, voyager, buffy. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the Buffy the Vampire Slayer episode Nightmares, which of these was NOT one of Buffys fears?

options.text: Not being prepared for a test
Being at fault for her parents divorce

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Having to sing in public

questions.question: Which of Rorys boyfriends in the series Gilmore Girls graduated from college?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Logan

questions.question: In the Buffy the Vampire Slayer episode Teachers Pet, what kind of giant insect was Ms. Natalie French?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Praying mantis

questions.question: What was the name of the first vampire Buffy killed in the Buffy the Vampire Slayer series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thomas

questions.question: Name the Voyager crew member who said, Personally, I dont go out with girls from other galaxies.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Paris

questions.question: On the TV show Gilmore Girls Dean broke up with Rory twice. The first time was because he said I love you and Rory didnt respond.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Where did Buffys mom, Joyce, first meet Mr. Giles in the Buffy the Vampire Slayer series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In the hospital

questions.question: In the Buffy the Vampire Slayer, what does Buffy do when she first finds out about the prophecy concerning her death and the Master?

options.text: She goes to fight the Master

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She quits slaying

questions.question: In Buffy the Vampire Slayer, what was the name of the high school in Los Angeles Buffy was kicked out of?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hemery High

questions.question: Gilmore Girls character Rory never broke up with her boyfriends, they all broke up with her.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Sid the Dummy was a demon slayer cursed by which demonic organization on the Buffy the Vampire Slayer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Brotherhood of Seven

questions.question: In the series Gilmore Girls, only one of Rorys loves seemed to have any actual friends (rather than acquaintances). Which was the popular fellow?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Logan

questions.question: Which of Rory Gilmores loves was a published author towards the end of the series Gilmore Girls?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jess

questions.question: What was the name of the witch from the episode Witch from the first season of Buffy the Vampire Slayer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Catherine Madison

questions.question: In the Buffy the Vampire Slayer series, Jenny Calendar is a computer teacher at Sunnydale.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Gilmore Girls and Lorelai
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, college. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Milo Ventamiglia played Rorys boyfriend Dean on the TV show Gilmore Girls.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which college did Gilmore Girls character Rory attend after much debate over its pros and cons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yale

questions.question: What Voyager crew member said, Sometimes I think everyone on this ship has been possessed by alien hormones.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Doctor

questions.question: What fictional city do Gilmore Girls characters Lorelai and Rory live in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stars Hallow, CT

questions.question: Who sings the Gilmore Girls theme song?

options.text: Carole King and her daughter Louise
Louise King and her daughter Jane

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carole King and her daughter Louise

questions.question: Why did Julie marry Bob Anderson?

options.text: The was on the rebound after her husband died
She was pregnant with his child
The man she loved was married to someone else

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The man she loved was married to someone else

questions.question: Kelly Bishop, who plays Emily Gilmore on Gilmore Girls, was in the box-office hit Dirty Dancing.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: How are Hope Brady and Julie Williams related?

options.text: Julie is Hopes sister and stepmother

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Julie is Hopes sister and stepmother

questions.question: What is the name of the actress who plays Lorelai in the series Gilmore Girls?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lauren Graham

questions.question: Who is the father of David Banning?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: David Martin

questions.question: Who has Rory not been in a relationship with on the show Gilmore Girls?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tristan DuGrey

questions.question: What is the name Sookies husband played by actor Jackson Douglas on Gilmore Girls?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jackson Melville

questions.question: What is Rorys real name in the TV series Gilmore Girls?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lorelai

questions.question: Who was Mike Hortons first sexual experience with?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Linda Patterson Phillips

questions.question: Who has Lorelai not been in a relationship with in the series Gilmore Girls?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Taylor Doose

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Clark and Season
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, horton, convent. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: How was Evan Wyland connected to the Horton Family?

options.text: He was married to Marie Horton.
He was a sperm donor and the natural father of Sarah Horton
He has no connection to the family
He was married to Jessica Marshall

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He has no connection to the family

questions.question: On TV show Smallville, when Clark gets sick and Chloe writes him a poem, expressing her feelings to him, Clark says Chloes name when she gets finished reading it.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Another easy one: Doug Williams real name is Brent Douglas.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Where did Bill Horton meet Doug Williams?

options.text: Bill met Doug in prison, they were cellmates
Bill met Doug after he was married to his niece.
Bill and Doug were college roommates.
Bill met Doug after he was married to his sister.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bill met Doug in prison, they were cellmates

questions.question: Why did Doug Williams marry Addie Olsen?

options.text: Addie bribed him to marry her to keep him away from Julie.
She was pregnant with Hope and Doug felt obligated to marry her.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Addie bribed him to marry her to keep him away from Julie.

questions.question: What ended the marriage of Don and Maggie?

options.text: Don was killed in an accident.
Don had an affair with Marlena
Maggie fell in love with Mickey Horton

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They were never married

questions.question: Why did Marie Horton run away to a convent?

options.text: She joined the convent because she was fleeing an abusive relationship.
She was always religious, and panicked when she found out she was pregnant out of wedlock and joined the convent after giving her baby up for adoption.
She ran away after finding out that her new love was in reality her long lost brother, Tommy, and wanted to repent for her sins
She was always very religious and joined the convent to fulfill a life long dream.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She was always religious, and panicked when she found out she was pregnant out of wedlock and joined the convent after giving her baby up for adoption.

questions.question: Which of the following are Stefano DiMeras children?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: all of these

questions.question: When did the animated sitcom Family Guy fist air?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: January 31, 1999

questions.question: Julie found Uncle Mickey after he was presumed dead from a picture in the newspaper about the winner of a local county fair.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who helped Megan Hathaway try to steal Bo Brady away from Hope?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stefano DiMera

questions.question: On which episode of season 4 of Smallville does Clark meet Lois?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Episode 1

questions.question: Before season 5 of Smallville, how many types of Kryptonite are shown on the show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3 (green, red and black)

questions.question: During which season did Whitney Fordman leave the TV show Smallville?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Season 1

questions.question: Who created Family Guy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Seth MacFarlane

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Dreams and Episode
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, casualties, camp. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the episode Dreams of the M*A*S*H series, Max Klinger dreams hes back in his home town of Toledo, Ohio. Finding one of his favorite haunts, Tony Packos, he cleans off the glass on the outside of the store to see in. What does he see?

options.text: heavy fighting in a war zone

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the operating room at M*A*S*H 4077

questions.question: Why is the 4077 required to accommodate an overflow of casualties in the camp in the episode from the television series M*A*S*H, entitled Dreams?

options.text: Bad weather prohibits travel by ambulance.
An administrator refuses to send ambulances.
A wounded general refuses to move wounded troops.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: An administrator refuses to send ambulances.

questions.question: In the M*A*S*H episode Dreams, the good Father Mulcahy suffers nightmares like the rest of the 4077th. The overworked priest falls asleep while listening to a confession in Post-Op. Who does Father Mulcahy dream he is?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the Pope

questions.question: In the Dreams episode of M*A*S*H, the main cast members are forced to find a place to sleep wherever they can. The first dream sequence is Maj. Margaret Houlihans. When the dream opens, what is the Major wearing?

options.text: jeans and a red  white checked shirt

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a white wedding dress

questions.question: Family Guy debuted earlier than The Simpsons.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the M*A*S*H episode Dreams, Col. Sherman Potter dreams he is a young lad riding a horse. Suddenly, a grenade is thrown at him from out of the bushes. What does he do with the grenade?

options.text: hits it with a baseball bat
hits it with a polo mallet
catches it with a catchers mitt
dives off his horse into the water

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: hits it with a polo mallet

questions.question: The show Family Guy is set in a fictional town, located in this state.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rhode Island

questions.question: In the M*A*S*H episode Dreams, Hawkeye Pierce has a classic dream of failing a test and of course, the test is medical in nature. What happens each time Hawkeye does not know an answer to a question?

options.text: The instructor raps him on the knuckles.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He loses a limb.

questions.question: In the M*A*S*H episode, Dreams, how long have the nurses and surgeons gone without sleep?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 33 hrs.

questions.question: What is the name of the Griffins dog, who is also Peters best friend on the animated show Family Guy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brian

questions.question: In the Dreams episode of the TV series M*A*S*H, B.J. Hunnicutt falls asleep in the mess hall.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Family Guy characters Peter, Stewie, Brian, Quagmire and Tom Tucker are voiced by the same person.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: At the end of the M*A*S*H episode, Dreams, Houlihan, Hunnicutt, Potter, Winchester, Mulcahy, Klinger, and Pierce get together in the mess hall. As they look forward to their first respite after the marathon surgery, Winchester quotes Shakespeare. What is the quote?

options.text: We are such stuff as dreams are made on
Now it is the time of night
To be or not to be

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To sleep, perchance to dream

questions.question: What is Maj. Charles E. Winchester doing at the beginning of his dream in the M*A*S*H episode Dreams?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: performing a magic act

questions.question: When did the M*A*S*H episode Dreams originally air?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: February 18, 1980

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Simpsons and Joe Brown
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, judge, blues. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who was the first member of In Living Colors staff to be nominated for an Academy Award?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rosie Perez

questions.question: Dont have a cow, man! and Eat my shorts! are the catch phrases used by what character on The Simpsons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bart

questions.question: In what year did the Judge Joe Brown TV show debut?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1998

questions.question: What is the name of the Simpsons well-meaning next door neighbor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ned Flanders

questions.question: What is the first name of Dr. Hibbert, Springfields prominent doctor on The Simpsons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Julius

questions.question: These two In Living Color entrepreneurs ran a QVC style home shopping network selling obviously stolen goods from the back of a truck. They called their endeavor, The Homeboys Shopping Network. Which two actors ran the show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Damon and Keenan Wayans

questions.question: Judge Joe Brown presided over James Earl Ray’s (found guilty of Martin Luther Kings assassination) final appeal.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Judge Joe Brown was the first black prosecutor in this American city.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Memphis, TN

questions.question: This dirty, smelly, drunken homeless guy, played by Damon Wayons, would show up periodically in sketches in FOXs In Living Color, the first time harassing a group of commuters on a subway train.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anton Jackson

questions.question: What Simpsons character described the French as cheese-eating surrender monkeys?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Groundskeeper Willie

questions.question: Wrote a song about it. Like to hear it? Here it go! is the catchphrase of an old Blues musician named Calhoun Tubbs in the Fox series In Living Color. Can you name the actor who portrays him?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: David Allen  Grier

questions.question: What is the name of Mr. Burns long-lost son on the TV show The Simpsons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Larry

questions.question: Singer Snoop Dogg was a litigant on the Judge Joe Brown TV show.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What brand of beer is sold in the fictional city of Shelbyville on The Simpsons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fudd

questions.question: In FOX televisions In Living Color, David Allen Grier portrayed a convicted rapist named, Tiny. What word would bring him to a state where he had to be restrained by guards?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Breasteses

quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, judge, brown. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In season 3 of The Office, Dwight and his cousin initiate Ryan into the sales team at their family beet farm. What is the name of Dwights cousin?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mose

questions.question: On the TV show The Office, Pam reveals her true feelings for Jim on this day.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beach Day

questions.question: Who are the 2 new major characters introduced in season 3 of The Office when Jim moves to Stamford?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Karen and Andy

questions.question: When Dwight gets fired in season 3 of The Office, where does he end up working?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Staples

questions.question: Judge Joe Brown has no real judicial powers on the TV show  Judge Joe Brown.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What was Clarks birth name in the Smallville TV series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kal-El

questions.question: On the TV show The Office, when Michaels girlfriend, Jan, gets fired from Corporate, who gets her job?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ryan

questions.question: Where do Michael and Jan go on vacation in season 3 of the TV series The Office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jamaica

questions.question: In The Office episode The Convict, when Michael finds out that Steve Nash, one of the people that came from Stamford, is an ex-convict he adopts this nickname.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Prison Mike

questions.question: Judge Joe Brown has claimed unequivocally that the rifle alleged to have been used to kill Dr. Martin Luther King is not the actual murder weapon.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Did rapper Coolio ever appear on the Judge Joe Brown show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: In the American TV series Smallville, who is the female character whom Clark Kent jilts in order to protect her, even though he loves her deeply?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lana Lang

questions.question: At Phyllis wedding in season 3 of the show The Office, what does Michael drag down the aisle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a wheelchair

questions.question: Who comes out of the closet in the very first episode of season 3 of the TV show The Office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oscar

questions.question: In The Office episode Traveling Salesmen, who is Stanleys first choice for sales partner?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ryan
